Scenario: Your boyfriend wants you to call him Daddy.
SayNo: I have something to show you in private. Can you come over to my place tonight?

Scenario: Your boyfriend has been showering you with love and attention. He keeps telling you he'll give you anything you need.
SayNo: If you're in love with me you'd do what I want. Are you in love with me?

Scenario: Your parents have been fighting at home. Your latest crush offers for you to stay at his place.
SayNo: I know a way for you to make some easy money. Want to give it a try?

Scenario: The guy you have a big crush is having money problems. He needs your help and asks you for a favor.
SayNo: The fight last night was your fault. Don't you dare tell anybody. Ok?

Scenario: A guy you don't know requests to be your friend on Facebook.
SayNo: You are mine. I don't want you to talk to anybody from school but me. You can do that, right?

Scenario: Your guy gave you a new phone. Now you can share secret text messages and pictures just between you two.
SayNo: You seem pretty upset. Wanna take a shot of vodka or smoke something?

Scenario: You realize the guy you've been seeing is older than you thought.
SayNo: You're so beautiful. I bet some guys on this website are interested in you. Wanna try it out?

Scenario: You're at a party and people are taking turns giving one guy sexual favors.
A guy you just met at a party asks to take you for dinner.
A guy you just met is sexting you.
A guy you met at a party texts you the next day. You don't remember giving him your phone number.
A guy you really like asks you to pay him back for a gift he bought you last week. If you don't do it, he might break up with you.

You notice your friend has a few more bruises and swelling than normal. She's avoiding talking about it.

The guy you're dating said he loves you. Now he's acting differently.

You've been obsessing over a guy you met outside of school. You're not sure where he's from, but he knows exactly the right times to show up.
Your best friend is asking you to keep a secret, but you think she's in trouble.
Your best girlfriend gets repeated calls from the new guy she is seeing.

Your boyfriend gives you a bracelet and you have no idea why.

Your boyfriend pulls out his phone while you're messing around.
Your boyfriend takes pictures of you. He shows them to his friends.

Your boyfriend wants to have sex. You've just started dating.
